msg.msgText:
The "ClusterMembership" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update ClusterMembership help imaserver update ClusterMembership "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update ClusterMembership "ControlPort=9102"
Configuration items for "ClusterMembership" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command help.
